entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late this morning. High 9. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
